name: @mobius/kernel
description: Constitutional enforcement layer for Kaizen OS / Mobius Agent Stack

scripts.test: python3 src/mobius_kernel.py && python3 src/thought_broker_integration.py || echo 'Python tests skipped (python3 not available)'
scripts.lint: python3 -m ruff check src/ || echo 'ruff not installed, skipping lint'

author: Mobius Systems
